nodes.bodyText: What is the purpose of this annotation?

This description does not match the style we generally adhere to with extension and component descriptions. I see that it stems from Camel. Could you please re-word it there to match the "verb first" style informing the reader about what can be done with the given extension/component? It should also make clear whether this ws client, ws server or both.
Inspiration:

For AHC client, we have Exchange data with external Websocket servers using Async Http Client
For JSR356 server, we have Expose websocket endpoints using JSR356
